node.title: Ebenezer
node.description: God was on the move in Israel! After twenty years of spiritual lethargy, a revival and reformation was born through the persevering efforts of Samuel. Of course the devil wouldn’t stand by idly and watch, so trouble was on the move too! In this message we explore God’s goodness to His people, and how we too can “raise our Ebenezer” of thankfulness to Him!
